text: Jaime Aceves Pérez (born 2 September 1961) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Jalisco. He studied law at the Universidad Veracruzana and mechanical engineering/communications at the University of Guadalajara. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Guadalajara, Jalisco Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:Universidad Veracruzana alumni Category:University of Guadalajara alumni
title: Jaime Aceves Pérez
